'The system shall link Events back to either the Sync Matrix 1.0 or the Exercise Managment Tool 1.0 applications for modifications.': Functional Suitability
'If a lead is scored to the high range the system will supply the lead data and score to the enterprise system.': Functional Suitability
'The audit report shall include the total score of the audit which sums the indivual line items.': Functional Suitability
'The language of the product shall accommodate all of the target market countries. 90% of survey respondents from each target market country will find that the language of the product is acceptable.': Performance Efficiency
'System shall let existing customers log into the website with their email address and password in under 5 seconds.': Performance Efficiency
The product shall ensure that only supervisors can view schedule of all callers.The product must ensure that supervisors are allowed to access advertise empty time slots.': Security
'The product must make use of web/application server technology. Open source examples include Apache web server Tomcat and the JBoss application server.': Compatibility
'Changes to revenue and expense formulae must be applied to the RFS system every year prior to the budgeting process start. Revenue and expense formulae will be updated within one week of their receipt after which 2 weeks will be allotted to testing of the budget calculations to be conducted jointly by the project development team and PCG Finance.': Maintainability
'The WCS system shall have the ability to include data for regions outside the United States and be accessed by users outside of the United States if approved by CCR management.': Performance Efficiency
'The WCS system shall be run in a Windows environment. The WCS shall be accessed by users through the Internet on an IBM computer running a Windows 2000 or above operating system.': Compatibility

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The system shall able to operate within a business office environment typical of the Nursing Department at DePaul University.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting specific students including but not limited to changing a student’s status from full time to part time and moving a student to a different clinical section.': Functional Suitability
'The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting classes including but not limited to class cancellations class section detail changes and changes to class offerings for a given quarter.': Functional Suitability
'The system will notify affected parties for routine communication purposes including but not limited to informing students of upcoming offered classes (timeline) and what their schedule will be/shall be.': Functional Suitability
'The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting clinicals including but not limited to clinical section capacity changes and clinical section cancellations.': Functional Suitability
'The Dispute System shall provide the users with the ability to follow up on a dispute case via follow-up actions. The list of available follow up actions for a given dispute case must be filtered by the status of the case and the access level of the user.': Functional Suitability
'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall have the ability to modify information relating to cohorts including cohort identifier program of study preferred sequence of classes and quarters that a cohort will be taking specific classes.': Functional Suitability
'The system shall be able to display a printable summary for individual nursing students which will include (but not be limited to) student name student ID admission date classes credits GPA and the cohort that the student is enrolled in.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes System shall record the name of the user and the date for any activity that creates or modifies the disputes case in the system. A detailed history of the actions taken on the case including the date and the user that performed the action must be maintained for auditing purposes.': Functional Suitability
'The system shall notify customers of changes to its information policy.': Security
'The Disputes application shall interface with the Cardmember Posting and Billing System. This will allow the Disputes application to request adjustments to cardmember and merchant’s accounts. All adjustment requests must be sent to the Cardmember Posting and Billing System.': Compatibility
'The system shall help the user avoid making mistakes while scheduling classes and clinicals for the nursing students.': Usability

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The streaming server will support a maximum of 700 movies; new servers can be added to support more movies.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The search for the preferred repair facility shall take no longer than 8 seconds. The preferred repair facility is returned within 8 seconds'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The product must support Internet Explorer 5.5 and above.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The system shall reveal private information only in compliance with the organization’s information policy.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'The product shall make the users want to use it. 80% of the users surveyed report they are regularly using the product after the first 2 weeks post-launch.': Usability
'The product must be able to interface with any HTML browser. The product shall transmit data between the user and the product without problems. The product shall display HTML properly in 80% of all HTML browsers tested (minimum is to test 8 browsers).': Compatibility
'The product should be able to be used by 90% of novice users on the Internet.': Usability
'The product shall be available during normal business hours. As long as the user has access to the client PC the system will be available 99% of the time during the first six months of operation.': Reliability
'The product shall be available 99% of the time. Rationale: To avoid service interruption during busiest customer service response periods. The product shall be available 99.99% of the time for regular business days.': Reliability

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'Every registered user will have access to the product’s support site via the Internet. 70% of registered users shall find a solution to their problem within 5 minutes of using the support site.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'An anonymous survey will show that 70% of customers are comfortable purchasing streaming movies after 2 weeks using the website.': Usability
'The product shall be available 99% of the time. Rationale: To avoid service interruption during busiest customer service response periods. The product shall be available 99.99% of the time for regular business days.': Reliability

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'An anonymous survey will show that 95% of customers are comfortable using and purchasing pre-paid cards after a month of using the system.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'The product shall be capable of handling the existing 1000 users. This number is expected to grow 5 times within the next year.': Performance Efficiency
'The product shall be able to handle 10 000 concurrent users within 2 years of the initial launch.': Performance Efficiency

'Product shall allow entering storing and modifying product menus used by POS terminals.': Functional Suitability

'The system shall use the organization’s standard virus protection software to help monitor threats to itself.': Security

'100% of the cardmember and merchant services representatives shall use the Disputes application regularly after a 2-day training course.': Usability
'The system shall be available for use between the hours of 8am and 6pm.': Reliability
'The product shall maintain a list of players.': Functional Suitability

'The system shall use IBM and CCR branding standards. The interface must have one IBM logo and one CCR logo.': Usability

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The product shall be able support 1000 simultaneous users.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'The system shall be able to display a printable summary for individual nursing students which will include (but not be limited to) student name student ID admission date classes credits GPA and the cohort that the student is enrolled in.': Functional Suitability

'For each class within a sequence for a cohort Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to specify which quarter that class will be offered.': Functional Suitability
'For each class within a sequence for a cohort Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to specify which quarter that class will be offered.': Functional Suitability

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'System shall let customers cancel their account process shall take no longer than 2 minutes. Database will mark the account as inactive and user will not be able to log into the website.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The maximum wait time for a user navigating from one screen to another within the Disputes application shall be no more than 5 seconds.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall have the ability to modify information relating to a Program of Study within the Nursing Department including the Program of study name and required classes for that Program of Study.': Functional Suitability
'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall have the ability to modify information relating to a Nursing Student including student ID student name phone number e-mail status (full time or part time) and program of study.': Functional Suitability
'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall have the ability to modify information relating to cohorts including cohort identifier program of study preferred sequence of classes and quarters that a cohort will be taking specific classes.': Functional Suitability
'The system shall allow a Program Administrator/Nursing Staff Member to move a student from one clinical lab section to another clinical lab section corresponding to the same clinical class.': Functional Suitability
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a student who has registered for a clinical class to a clinical lab section for that class.': Functional Suitability
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a new clinical lab section for an existing clinical class into the System.': Functional Suitability
'A clinical lab section shall include the clinical site name the class instructor day and time of the lab.': Functional Suitability
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a new clinical site into the system.': Functional Suitability
'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall be able to create a new Program of Study.': Functional Suitability
'A staff member shall have the ability to manage the progress of a part time student which includes modifying their sequence of classes and timeline of classes.': Functional Suitability
'Clinical site information shall include (but not be limited to) the name of the site contact person and contact information.': Functional Suitability
'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members are the only people who shall have access to clinical site details.': Security
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a listing of students to a cohort.': Functional Suitability
'The system shall allow a Program Administrator or Nursing staff member to remove a student from a clinical lab section.': Functional Suitability
'2 out of 3 Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall successfully be able to use the system to manage the scheduling of classes and clinicals.': Usability
'The system shall be able to display a printable summary for individual nursing students which will include (but not be limited to) student name student ID admission date classes credits GPA and the cohort that the student is enrolled in.': Functional Suitability

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall have the ability to modify information relating to a Clinical Lab Section including the clinical site name the department/section for the lab the class instructor day and time of lab and contact information.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'A list of all disputes cases that meet the entered search criteria must be provided to the user. The list of cases must differentiate the type and/or status of the case by color -coding the line item in the list. For example all open cases will be yellow and all closed cases will be gray.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes System must allow the users to select disputable transactions (based on the age of the transaction) from a user interface and initiate a dispute (ticket retrieval request or chargeback notification) on the selected transaction.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes System will provide the user the ability to create or initiate a ticket retrieval request. As part of ticket retrieval creation process the system must prompt the user to enter all the required information to create the ticket retrieval request. The ticket retrieval request is a document that is sent to merchant inquiring the validity of a transaction.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes System shall record the name of the user and the date for any activity that creates or modifies the disputes case in the system. A detailed history of the actions taken on the case including the date and the user that performed the action must be maintained for auditing purposes.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes System must provide a confirmation to the user upon the creation of ticket retrieval request that contains the following information; the dispute case number the type of retrieval requested (copy original or portfolio) and the date that the merchant response is due.': Functional Suitability
'The Dispute System shall provide the users with the ability to follow up on a dispute case via follow-up actions. The list of available follow up actions for a given dispute case must be filtered by the status of the case and the access level of the user.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes System shall allow the user to create or initiate a chargeback request. The system must prompt the user to enter the required information to initiate a chargeback request. The chargeback request results in a printed chargeback notification that is sent to merchant indicating that their account will be charged back if no proof is provided that the disputed transaction is valid.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes System shall accurately provide a list of possible reason codes for a given transaction. The list of possible reason codes must be derived based on the type of transaction and the industry that the merchant belongs to according to the business rules defined for the Disputes System.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes System must provide the user the ability to initiate a single dispute case on multiple transactions that belong to a single merchant.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes System must allow the user to create three unique types of ticket retrieval requests. The three types of ticket retrieval requests are (1) Request for original receipt (2) Request for a copy of the receipt or (3) Request for a portfolio. A portfolio consists of documentation that would provide proof of a purchase such as the documentation that is received from a car rental agency that is more than a sales receipt.': Functional Suitability

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The Disputes System must provide Search functionality. The search method must include the ability to search by (1) the dispute case number (2) the merchant account number (3) the cardmember account number and (4) the issuer number. In addition to the above criteria the search functionality must further allow the user to limit the results of the search by a date range the type of dispute (ticket retrieval request or chargeback notification) the case status (open closed or all) and the dispute reason code.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'The leads washing functionality will compile both contact and academic scoring information for a total score.': Functional Suitability
'The leads washing functionality will have an interface in which lead data parameters can be maintained.': Functional Suitability
'Prior to submitting the lead to the enterprise system the leads washing functionality will assign the lead to an admissions rep.': Functional Suitability
'The leads washing functionality will return the lead data supplied to the vendor along with the reason of rejection.': Functional Suitability

'The leads washing functionality will store any potential lead duplicates returned by the enterprise system.': Functional Suitability

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'Daily usage statistics should be logged and accessible by the administrator.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a new cohort to the system identified by start month and year.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'New branches/complexes/districts/regions and revenue/expense accounts added to the BDW must be reflected in the RFS system. 100% of the entities (mentioned above) available as of October month-end will be loaded into the RFS system prior to the budget start process.': Maintainability
'The RFS system should be available 24/7 especially during the budgeting period. The RFS system shall be available 90% of the time all year and 98% during the budgeting period. 2% of the time the system will become available within 1 hour of the time that the situation is reported.': Reliability
'Changes to revenue and expense formulae must be applied to the RFS system every year prior to the budgeting process start. Revenue and expense formulae will be updated within one week of their receipt after which 2 weeks will be allotted to testing of the budget calculations to be conducted jointly by the project development team and PCG Finance.': Maintainability
'The users should be able to easily use the system to successfully complete their budgets within the stipulated time for completion. With a week of training prior to product implementation 98% of the users shall complete their budgets within the stipulated time.': Usability
'The product shall provide Monitoring Services.The product shall be easy for System Administrators and DBAs to use after two weeks of usage.': Usability

'The process must fit within the processing time conditions set forth by the Auto Rep Assignment process in which a lead is assigned within 3 minutes of the total life cycle.': Performance Efficiency

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The RFS system should be able to easily interface with the BDW environment in order to load the data. • 7 data files shall be received from the BDW and loaded into the RFS system within 3 hours one day prior to the start of budgeting process every year. The data will be as of October month-end. Test files (7) shall be loaded up to 5 times throughout the year from the BDW.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The product shall protect the identity of the players. The product shall provide players no access to information that might reveal the identity of another player.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The leads washing functionality will verify the users authentication and rights to make parameter updates.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'The Disputes System shall record the name of the user and the date for any activity that creates or modifies the disputes case in the system. A detailed history of the actions taken on the case including the date and the user that performed the action must be maintained for auditing purposes.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes System shall provide update access capability for authorized users of the application.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes System shall generate a User Report that details any new users that have been added and any changes to an existing user’s access level. The report will be reviewed for auditing purposes.': Security
'The system shall be built such that it is as secure as possible from malicious interference.': Security
'Every user of the system shall be authenticated and authorized.': Security
'System shall allow users to update their billing and contact information via the “My Account” section of the website.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall ensure that only company employees or external users with company-approved user IDs may have product access. 100% of all logons shall be by either company employees or external users with company-approved user IDs.': Security
'The system shall only be accessed by authorized Corporate Community Grants (CCR) employees. Users must be authenticated using their IBM intranet user name and password.': Security
'The Dispute System shall provide the users with the ability to follow up on a dispute case via follow-up actions. The list of available follow up actions for a given dispute case must be filtered by the status of the case and the access level of the user.': Functional Suitability
'The users should be able to easily use the system to successfully complete their budgets within the stipulated time for completion. With a week of training prior to product implementation 98% of the users shall complete their budgets within the stipulated time.': Usability

'The system shall use the organization’s standard virus protection software to help monitor threats to itself.': Security
'The product shall ensure that the database’s data corresponds to the data entered by the user. Each conference room reservation in the system will contain the same information as was entered by the user.': Security

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'If the leads score falls within the high average score then it will be process by the ARA functionality.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'If a user account is revoked it can only be re-instantiated by the System Administrator.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'All customer information will be stored on a secure database accessible only to authorized personnel.': Security
'The product shall ensure that the database’s data corresponds to the data entered by the user. Each conference room reservation in the system will contain the same information as was entered by the user.': Security
'All credit card information will be secured on the server and only accessible by authorized Izogn administrators. Information will be encrypted in the database.': Security
'System shall allow users to update their billing and contact information via the “My Account” section of the website.': Functional Suitability
'The product must be able to interface with various database management systems. The product shall communicate successfully with the database management system on 100% of all transactions.': Compatibility
'The Disputes System shall record the name of the user and the date for any activity that creates or modifies the disputes case in the system. A detailed history of the actions taken on the case including the date and the user that performed the action must be maintained for auditing purposes.': Functional Suitability
'The product must be highly configurable for use with various database management systems for the end users. 80% of end users are able to integrate new database management systems with the product without changing the product’s software code.': Maintainability
'The product must work with most database management systems (DBMS) on the market whether the DBMS is colocated with the product on the same machine or is located on a different machine on the computer network.': Compatibility
'Only valid data shall be entered into the system. No invalid data shall be entered into the system.': Security
'The Disputes applications shall interface with the Merchant Information Database. The Merchant Information Database provides detailed information with regard to the merchant. All merchant detail information shall be obtained from the Merchant Information Database.': Compatibility
'The product shall ensure that only company employees or external users with company-approved user IDs may have product access. 100% of all logons shall be by either company employees or external users with company-approved user IDs.': Security
'The system shall have basic data integrity checking to reduce the possibility of incorrect or invalid data being introduced.': Security
'The product and/or dependent databases/filesystems shall remain operational as a result of the input of malicious data. The product and/or dependent databases/filesystems shall not crash 100% of the time that malicious data is input into the product.': Reliability
'The product shall adhere to the corporate online availability schedule. The application is brought down only within 98% of the scheduled outages per the availability schedule.': Reliability
'The website shall make its user aware of its information practices before collection data from them via a Privacy Policy accessible on all pages of the website.': Security

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'All registered customer information shall be stored and maintained in the database even after the customer cancels their account.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'The system shall be expected to manage the nursing program curriculum and class/clinical scheduling for a minimum of 5 years.': Performance Efficiency
'The system shall be able to display a printable summary for individual nursing students which will include (but not be limited to) student name student ID admission date classes credits GPA and the cohort that the student is enrolled in.': Functional Suitability
'The users should be able to easily use the system to successfully complete their budgets within the stipulated time for completion. With a week of training prior to product implementation 98% of the users shall complete their budgets within the stipulated time.': Usability
'The system shall be able to display a printable summary for individual cohorts which will include the students enlisted the Program of study sequence of classes cohort progress through the program and timeline of completion.': Functional Suitability
'2 out of 3 Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall successfully be able to use the system to manage the scheduling of classes and clinicals.': Usability
'The system shall help the user avoid making mistakes while scheduling classes and clinicals for the nursing students.': Usability
'The system shall be intuitive to the Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members.': Usability
'The verbiage used within the system shall be consistent with Standard English and the terminology of the national Nursing Community.': Usability
'The product shall be available during normal business hours. As long as the user has access to the client PC the system will be available 99% of the time during the first six months of operation.': Reliability
The system shall have high availability every day of the year.The system must be available for use between 12:00AM and 6:00PM all days of the year.': Reliability
'The product shall be capable of handling the existing 1000 users. This number is expected to grow 5 times within the next year.': Performance Efficiency
'The interface shall be easy to use. 90% of users should be able to successfully use the system to generate a report on their first use. The interface should adhere to IBM usability standards.': Usability

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The system shall be capable of processing 100% of nursing students and their classes for the next 10 years.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'The product shall prevent the input of malicious data. The product and/or adjacent hardware/software systems’ data shall remain 100% uncorrupted each time malicious data is input into the product.': Security
'The website shall prevent its data from being corrupted when incorrect data is entered in.': Security
'The system shall have basic data integrity checking to reduce the possibility of incorrect or invalid data being introduced.': Security
'The product and/or dependent databases/filesystems shall remain operational as a result of the input of malicious data. The product and/or dependent databases/filesystems shall not crash 100% of the time that malicious data is input into the product.': Reliability
'The product shall be robust.The product shall have fault avoidance based on standards adoption.': Reliability
'The product shall create an exception log of problems encountered within the product for transmission to our company for analysis and resolution.': Reliability
'The product shall provide Error Tracking Services.The product shall help the System Administrators and DBAs to resolve transaction errors 99% of the time.': Usability
'The product shall information Security. The product shall enable privacy by encryption WS-Security and Integrity Checking.': Security
'The product shall achieve a 98% uptime. The product shall not fail more than 2% of the available online time.': Reliability
'The System shall allow entering storing and modifying product formulas.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall ensure that the database’s data corresponds to the data entered by the user. Each conference room reservation in the system will contain the same information as was entered by the user.': Security
'The product shall retain user preferences in the event of a failure.': Reliability
'The product shall ensure that it can only be accessed by authorized users. The product will be able to distinguish between authorized and unauthorized users in all access attempts': Security
'Only valid data shall be entered into the system. No invalid data shall be entered into the system.': Security

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The product shall prevent its data from incorrect data being introduced.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

': The product shall continue to operate during upgrade change or new resource addition.The product shall be able to continue to operate with no interruption in service due to new resource additions.': Maintainability

'The Disputes System shall provide update access capability for authorized users of the application.': Functional Suitability

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'A user shall be able to use the system without instruction after a short amount of time. After one use a user should understand and remember 90% of the system usage and navigation.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'The Disputes System must allow the users to select disputable transactions (based on the age of the transaction) from a user interface and initiate a dispute (ticket retrieval request or chargeback notification) on the selected transaction.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes System shall record the name of the user and the date for any activity that creates or modifies the disputes case in the system. A detailed history of the actions taken on the case including the date and the user that performed the action must be maintained for auditing purposes.': Functional Suitability
'A list of all disputes cases that meet the entered search criteria must be provided to the user. The list of cases must differentiate the type and/or status of the case by color -coding the line item in the list. For example all open cases will be yellow and all closed cases will be gray.': Functional Suitability
'The Dispute System shall provide the users with the ability to follow up on a dispute case via follow-up actions. The list of available follow up actions for a given dispute case must be filtered by the status of the case and the access level of the user.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes System shall generate a User Report that details any new users that have been added and any changes to an existing user’s access level. The report will be reviewed for auditing purposes.': Security
'The Disputes System must provide the user the ability to initiate a single dispute case on multiple transactions that belong to a single merchant.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes System shall prevent the creation of duplicate dispute requests 100% of the time.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes System will facilitate direct data entry of a dispute case via a user interface that supports real time responses to the users.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes System shall allow the user to create or initiate a chargeback request. The system must prompt the user to enter the required information to initiate a chargeback request. The chargeback request results in a printed chargeback notification that is sent to merchant indicating that their account will be charged back if no proof is provided that the disputed transaction is valid.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes System shall provide the users the ability to view the history of all activities that have occurred on the dispute case.': Functional Suitability
'For any systematic (non-user initiated) action that occurs on a case such as the disputes aging process a case activity will be generated. Upon the next logon the user that initiated the dispute case must be notified that a systematic action has occurred on the dispute case.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes applications shall interface with the Merchant Information Database. The Merchant Information Database provides detailed information with regard to the merchant. All merchant detail information shall be obtained from the Merchant Information Database.': Compatibility
'All updates to data files or database must be initiated from the Disputes System.': Security
'The Disputes System must provide a confirmation to the user upon the creation of ticket retrieval request that contains the following information; the dispute case number the type of retrieval requested (copy original or portfolio) and the date that the merchant response is due.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes System must be accessible by both internal and external users.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes application shall manipulate and view business data. Users will not have direct access to data files or databases.': Security
'The Disputes System must prevent external users from requesting original receipts. Requests for original receipts are restricted to internal users.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes System shall accurately provide a list of possible reason codes for a given transaction. The list of possible reason codes must be derived based on the type of transaction and the industry that the merchant belongs to according to the business rules defined for the Disputes System.': Functional Suitability

Now, classify the following given requirement: On a 112k connection or faster the system response time for all operations must be no more than 3 seconds 90% of the time.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category:

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'Application updates shall occur between 3AM and 6 AM CST on Wednesday morning during the middle of the NFL season.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall have the ability to modify information relating to a Clinical Site including the clinical site name site contact person contact information and address.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add new classes to a sequence of classes': Functional Suitability
'A Program Administrator/Nursing Staff Member shall be able to add a new nursing student to the system.': Functional Suitability

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add new classes for the nursing department into the system.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
'System shall let the administrator add/remove categories on the website in under 5 minutes.': Performance Efficiency
'System shall let customers register on the website as a “unlimited movie subscriber” user in under 10 minutes.': Performance Efficiency

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'System shall let administrator add/remove movies on the website in under 5 minutes. Entered movie information will be stored in the database and will now be available on the website.'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.
Below are some demonstration examples for you to learn, which consist of a software requirement and its category: 
': The product shall continue to operate during upgrade change or new resource addition.The product shall be able to continue to operate with no interruption in service due to new resource additions.': Maintainability

'The product shall provide Monitoring Services.The product shall be easy for System Administrators and DBAs to use after two weeks of usage.': Usability

'The product shall have audit capabilities.The product shall store messages for a minimum of one year for audit and transaction tracking purposes.': Security

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'Formula substitutionary ingredients shall be kept in persisted order'


Please classify the given software requirements into the following categories: Functional Suitability, Usability, Performance Efficiency, Security, Compatibility, Reliability, Maintainability. The answer should be very concise and short, i.e. only one of the above-mentioned categories.

'The Disputes System must provide a confirmation to the user upon the creation of ticket retrieval request that contains the following information; the dispute case number the type of retrieval requested (copy original or portfolio) and the date that the merchant response is due.': Functional Suitability
'A Program of Study shall consist of a program name and listing of required classes (both clinical and non-clinical) that must be completed.': Functional Suitability
'The system shall display Events in a vertical table by time.': Functional Suitability
'For estimators the product shall be able to be operated in a repair facility during dirty and noisy conditions.': Compatibility
'The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting clinicals including but not limited to clinical section capacity changes and clinical section cancellations.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes application shall interface with the Cardmember Posting and Billing System. This will allow the Disputes application to request adjustments to cardmember and merchant’s accounts. All adjustment requests must be sent to the Cardmember Posting and Billing System.': Compatibility
'A list of all disputes cases that meet the entered search criteria must be provided to the user. The list of cases must differentiate the type and/or status of the case by color -coding the line item in the list. For example all open cases will be yellow and all closed cases will be gray.': Functional Suitability
'The system shall link Events back to either the Sync Matrix 1.0 or the Exercise Managment Tool 1.0 applications for modifications.': Functional Suitability
'The system shall provide a history report of changes made to the Activity or Event data': Functional Suitability
'All credit card information will be secured on the server and only accessible by authorized Izogn administrators. Information will be encrypted in the database.': Security
'The application shall match the color of the schema set forth by Department of Homeland Security': Usability
'The product shall adhere to the corporate online availability schedule. The application is brought down only within 98% of the scheduled outages per the availability schedule.': Reliability
'Any interface between a user and the automated system shall have a maximum response time of 5 seconds unless noted by an exception below.': Performance Efficiency
'The product must work with most database management systems (DBMS) on the market whether the DBMS is colocated with the product on the same machine or is located on a different machine on the computer network.': Compatibility
'The product shall be installed by an untrained realtor without recourse to separately-printed instructions.': Usability
'The product shall display the grids within a circle as a view from a periscope.': Usability
'The product shall be able to support multiple remote users': Performance Efficiency
'For each class within a sequence for a cohort Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to specify which quarter that class will be offered.': Functional Suitability

'The system shall notify customers of changes to its information policy.': Security
'A new user shall be able to navigate through the league and team pages within 30 seconds of reaching the start-up page.': Usability
'The product shall be platform independent.The product shall enable access to any type of development environment and platform.': Compatibility
'The website will use standard Internet conventions when interacting with the user.': Usability
'100% of the cardmember and merchant services representatives shall use the Disputes application regularly after a 2-day training course.': Usability
'The system shall operate within the Windows XP Professional operating system.': Compatibility
'The product shall operate with every platform.The product shall accommodate any new technology without any change in its architecture.': Maintainability
'A staff member shall have the ability to manage the progress of a part time student which includes modifying their sequence of classes and timeline of classes.': Functional Suitability
'The product will function alongside server software on any operating system where the Java runtime can be installed.': Compatibility
'The product will allow priviledged users to view meeting schedules in multiple reporting views.': Functional Suitability
'The product shall record different meeting types.': Functional Suitability
The system must be available for use between 7:00AM and 11:59PM all days of the year.': Reliability
'The product shall be capable of handling the existing 1000 users. This number is expected to grow 5 times within the next year.': Performance Efficiency
'The system shall filter data by: Venues and Key Events.': Functional Suitability
'The Disputes application shall interface with the Cardmember Information Database. The Cardmember Information Database provides detailed information with regard to a cardmember. All cardmember detail information must be obtained from the Cardmember Information Database.': Compatibility
'Only valid data shall be entered into the system. No invalid data shall be entered into the system.': Security
'The product will display an available status for unreserved conference rooms.': Functional Suitability
'All CCR users shall receive training before the WCS system is deployed. One training session will be held for 100% of CCR users before system deployment (based on a CCR user being available)': Usability
'The product shall allow a user to remove himself or herself from the list of players at any time.': Functional Suitability
The interface shall have a simple look. In the interface and usability survey 90% of beta testers must report that the interface is adequately simple.': Usability
'The System shall granularly control access rights to all major subsystems. It should be possible to assign access rights to all subsystems independently.': Security

Now, classify the following given requirement: 'The system shall use symbols and words that are naturally understandable by the user community.'
